body: You intimidate weaker allies into reckless ferocity.
name: Taskmaster
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Hobgoblins/New Racial Rules/Hobgoblin Feats/Taskmaster

sections.body: As a standard action, you spur an ally, who must have fewer Hit Dice than yourself, to reckless effort. For 1 minute, the ally gains a +1 morale bonus on attack rolls, weapon damage rolls, and Will saves against mind-affecting effects. However, the ally also takes a –2 penalty to AC and on skill checks. To affect an unwilling ally, you must succeed at an Intimidate check with the same DC used to demoralize your ally.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: If you have 10 or more ranks in Intimidate, the morale bonus increases to +2.
sections.name: Special
